title: The Seer
description: She's always been the one protected, shielded from the darkness in the world. But Miri wants to be as capable and strong as Desi and James. She wants to control her visions so they can actually be of use, actually give her friends an advantage over the dark.When her visions reveal an enemy fixated on James, Miri must face the evil alone, and risk everything to do it.
author: Ali Cross
